chinese: 苕之華、芸其黃矣。心之憂矣、維其傷矣。
english: The flowers of the bignonia,Are of a deep yellow.My heart is sad;I feel its wound.

chinese: 苕之華、其葉青青。知我如此、不如無生。
english: The flowers of the bignonia [are gone],[There are only] its leaves all-green.If I had known it would be thus with me,I had better not have been born.

chinese: 牂羊墳首、三星在罶。人可以食、鮮可以飽。
english: The ewes have large heads;The Three stars are [seen] in the fish-trap.If some men can get enough to eat,Few can get their fill.
